description: (Number of permutations of {1,2,...n} for which sums of adjacent numbers are all distinct)/2n.
comments: Essentially different ways 1,2,3,...n can be placed around a circle so that sums of adjacent numbers are distinct.
author: _Erich Friedman_
extensions: One more term from Vladeta Jovovic, Aug 25 2007
Three more terms from Steve Butler, Feb 08 2012
